brief.image_brief: A split-screen composition. On the left, a cluttered, dimly lit desk with overflowing spreadsheets and a slightly overwhelmed performance marketing manager (mid-30s, professional attire, diverse ethnicity, representing Alex Chen persona) struggling with manual data analysis. Subtle red/orange hues in this section to denote struggle. On the right, a bright, clean, and modern digital dashboard displaying clear, actionable performance ad insights with dynamic graphs and charts, predominantly in brand blue and white. A confident, focused marketer (same person as left, now empowered) is interacting with this screen. A subtle, transparent overlay of a 'rival' icon or a rising competitive graph element is visible on the right side, implying outmaneuvering. The overall aesthetic should be professional, clean, and convey a clear transition from chaos to clarity and competitive advantage. Use brand colors: blue, white, black.

video_brief.hook: Is manual analysis costing you campaign wins?

scenes.visual: Close-up on a desk cluttered with printouts, spreadsheets, and a laptop displaying complex, static data. Hands (representing Alex Chen) are frantically scrolling, looking overwhelmed. Dim, slightly desaturated lighting, emphasizing frustration.

Transition to a split screen. On one side, the previous cluttered desk, now with a faint, almost ghost-like rival company logo subtly appearing over it. On the other side, a rapidly updating digital dashboard showing a competitor's performance line sharply rising, while the user's line is flat.

Full screen transition to a sleek, modern digital performance marketing dashboard (predominantly brand blue and white). Dynamic graphs and charts animate, showing 'Your Performance' line rapidly accelerating upwards. Key metrics like 'Creative Insights' and 'Real-time Optimization' are highlighted with glowing blue accents. A hand confidently interacts with the screen, making a swift, decisive gesture.

The dashboard minimizes to reveal the 'Example Domain' brand headline and the CTA button 'Get Real-time Insights' prominently displayed against a clean blue and white background. Company URL example.com subtly visible.

video_brief.voiceover: Manual analysis kills speed. While you're digging, rivals are scaling, stealing your ad insights. Gain deep, instant creative insights to outmaneuver them. Iterate performance ads in real-time. Stop losing. Start winning.
